trans-unit.source: When a company produces quality translation, it will want to keep that quality consistent at all levels by using the following reference tools:

seg-source.mrk: When a company produces quality translation, it will want to keep that quality consistent at all levels by using the following reference tools:

target.mrk: When a company produces quality translation, it will want to keep that quality consistent at all levels by using the following reference tools:

trans-unit.source: Glossaries help maintain consistency at the word level

seg-source.mrk: Glossaries help maintain consistency at the word level

target.mrk: Glossaries help maintain consistency at the word level

trans-unit.source: Translation memories (databases of translated sentences) help maintain consistency at the sentence level

seg-source.mrk: Translation memories (databases of translated sentences) help maintain consistency at the sentence level

target.mrk: Translation memories (databases of translated sentences) help maintain consistency at the sentence level

trans-unit.source: Style guides help fill in the gaps by maintaining consistency of everything else including style and tone

seg-source.mrk: Style guides help fill in the gaps by maintaining consistency of everything else including style and tone

target.mrk: Style guides help fill in the gaps by maintaining consistency of everything else including style and tone

trans-unit.source: Consistency at 3 Levels

seg-source.mrk: Consistency at 3 Levels

target.mrk: Consistency at 3 Levels

trans-unit.source: Getting Started with Reference Tools

seg-source.mrk: Getting Started with Reference Tools

target.mrk: Getting Started with Reference Tools

trans-unit.source: Creation and implementation of reference tools for translation consistency can sometimes seem like a daunting task. Use the following tips to get started and simplify reference tool development and maintenance:

seg-source.mrk: Creation and implementation of reference tools for translation consistency can sometimes seem like a daunting task.
Use the following tips to get started and simplify reference tool development and maintenance:

target.mrk: Creation and implementation of reference tools for translation consistency can sometimes seem like a daunting task.
Use the following tips to get started and simplify reference tool development and maintenance:

trans-unit.source: Why Even Good Linguists Need Reference Tools

seg-source.mrk: Why Even Good Linguists Need Reference Tools

target.mrk: Why Even Good Linguists Need Reference Tools

trans-unit.source: “Decisions based on reference tools will be consistent, and decisions based on personal preferences will be inconsistent.”

seg-source.mrk: “Decisions based on reference tools will be consistent, and decisions based on personal preferences will be inconsistent.”

target.mrk: “Decisions based on reference tools will be consistent, and decisions based on personal preferences will be inconsistent.”

trans-unit.source: LOCALIZATION TIPS

seg-source.mrk: LOCALIZATION TIPS

target.mrk: LOCALIZATION TIPS

trans-unit.source: Manage centrally </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Reference Tools will be more useful and remain more up-to-date if everyone has easy centralized access to the current versions

target.mrk: Manage centrally </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Reference Tools will be more useful and remain more up-to-date if everyone has easy centralized access to the current versions

trans-unit.source: Involve all the right players in creation </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Involve everyone responsible for reviewing translations at any stage:

trans-unit.source: You may waste time reworking the references or the translations if these contribuitors become involed late and express preferences after the fact.

seg-source.mrk: You may waste time reworking the references or the translations if these contribuitors become involed late and express preferences after the fact.

target.mrk: You may waste time reworking the references or the translations if these contribuitors become involed late and express preferences after the fact.

trans-unit.source: Create a culture that updates regularly </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Instruct all the right players to update translation memory with every project, add terms to glossaries whenever there is more than one good translation for a word, and add rules to the style guide for any preference than can not be expressed in a glossary or translation memory.

seg-source.mrk: Create a culture that updates regularly </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Instruct all the right players to update translation memory with every project, add terms to glossaries whenever there is more than one good translation for a word, and add rules to the style guide for any preference than can not be expressed in a glossary or translation memory.

target.mrk: Create a culture that updates regularly </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Instruct all the right players to update translation memory with every project, add terms to glossaries whenever there is more than one good translation for a word, and add rules to the style guide for any preference than can not be expressed in a glossary or translation memory.

trans-unit.source: Start with existing company data </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Use existing company resources to begin growing your reference tools

trans-unit.source: Search for help from your industry </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Many industries have existing glossaries, style guides, and even translation memories. Avoid unnecessary duplication of effort.

seg-source.mrk: Search for help from your industry </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Many industries have existing glossaries, style guides, and even translation memories.
Avoid unnecessary duplication of effort.

target.mrk: Search for help from your industry </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>Many industries have existing glossaries, style guides, and even translation memories.
Avoid unnecessary duplication of effort.

trans-unit.source: Just do it </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>The last and most important tip is to just do it. Do it now even if your first glossary starts out with only 2 terms, your style guide starts with a one-line rule, and your translation memory starts with a single page. Start them today just to avoid that typical paralysis that could keep you from ever building and maintaining them at all. Most reference tools are grown slowly, and they must start with something, even if that something is little.

seg-source.mrk: Just do it </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>The last and most important tip is to just do it.
Do it now even if your first glossary starts out with only 2 terms, your style guide starts with a one-line rule, and your translation memory starts with a single page.
Start them today just to avoid that typical paralysis that could keep you from ever building and maintaining them at all.
Most reference tools are grown slowly, and they must start with something, even if that something is little.

target.mrk: Just do it </Content></CharacterStyleRange><CharacterStyleRange AppliedCharacterStyle="CharacterStyle/Body Text Style" FontStyle="Regular" Tracking="-10"><Properties><AppliedFont type="string">Franklin Gothic Book</AppliedFont></Properties><Content>The last and most important tip is to just do it.
Do it now even if your first glossary starts out with only 2 terms, your style guide starts with a one-line rule, and your translation memory starts with a single page.
Start them today just to avoid that typical paralysis that could keep you from ever building and maintaining them at all.
Most reference tools are grown slowly, and they must start with something, even if that something is little.
